title: Human Displacement, Forced Migration and Climate Change: Exploring the Politics of Rights, Sovereignty and Citizenship.
abstractText:
The outcomes of the five month Visiting Fellowship to Craig Johnson included the development of :

  • a database on climate-induced migration and environmental displacement
  • a review of the scholarly literature on environmental displacement, primarily in South Asia
  • peer-reviewed articles on national and international policies concerning the rights of environmental refugees
  • collaboration with DFID on a livelihoods programme in Bangladesh
  • six public presentations on his research at Oxford University and Oxfam. He also worked with several postgraduate students.
